# DMC Kreatif — Full Service Catalog & Technical Reference
> For the concise version, see /llms.txt

## Organization
- Name: DMC Kreatif
- Type: Premium European Web Development Agency
- Founded: 2023
- Founder: Musa Kerem Demirci (Full-Stack Developer)
- Email: hello@dmckreatif.com
- Website: https://dmckreatif.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/dmckreatif
- Languages: English (primary), French, Dutch, German
- Markets: France, Belgium, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland

## Complete Service Catalog (44 Services)

### Web Development (16 services)
1. **Custom Web Development** — Full-service website development with React 18, Next.js 14, and TypeScript
2. **React Development** — Component-based SPAs and web apps with React 18, hooks, and modern patterns
3. **Next.js Development** — Server-side rendered and statically generated sites with App Router
4. **TypeScript Development** — Type-safe full-stack development with strict TypeScript
5. **Frontend Development** — Responsive, accessible UI with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion
6. **Custom Web Applications** — Bespoke web applications for business-specific workflows
7. **Progressive Web Apps (PWA)** — Offline-capable, installable web apps with service workers
8. **API Development** — RESTful and GraphQL API design, implementation, and documentation
9. **Website Redesign** — Modernizing outdated sites while preserving SEO equity and content
10. **Legacy System Modernization** — Migrating from legacy stacks to modern React/Next.js
11. **Website Maintenance** — Ongoing updates, security patches, performance monitoring
12. **Headless CMS Development** — Content management with Payload CMS, Strapi, or Sanity
13. **Performance Optimization** — Core Web Vitals optimization, bundle splitting, lazy loading
14. **Accessibility (WCAG)** — WCAG 2.1 AA compliance audits and remediation
15. **GDPR Compliance** — Cookie consent, privacy policies, data processing for EU regulations
16. **Third-Party Integrations** — CRM, payment, analytics, and marketing tool integrations

### E-Commerce (9 services)
17. **E-Commerce Development** — Full online store solutions with secure payment processing
18. **Shopify Development** — Custom Shopify themes, Liquid templates, and app integrations
19. **WooCommerce Development** — WordPress-based stores with WooCommerce customization
20. **Custom E-Commerce** — Bespoke e-commerce platforms built from scratch with React
21. **B2B E-Commerce** — Wholesale portals with tiered pricing and bulk order management
22. **Multi-Currency Support** — Automatic currency detection, conversion, and localized pricing
23. **Payment Integration** — Stripe, LemonSqueezy, iDEAL, Bancontact, SEPA integration
24. **E-Commerce SEO** — Product schema, category optimization, and conversion rate improvement
25. **E-Commerce Analytics** — Revenue tracking, funnel analysis, and customer behavior insights

### SEO & Marketing (12 services)
26. **SEO Optimization** — Comprehensive search engine optimization for European markets
27. **Digital Marketing** — Multi-channel marketing strategy and campaign management
28. **Technical SEO** — Crawlability, indexability, Core Web Vitals, and structured data
29. **Local SEO** — Google Business Profile optimization, local citations, and map visibility
30. **International SEO** — Hreflang implementation, multi-market keyword strategy
31. **Content SEO** — Keyword research, content strategy, and topical authority building
32. **Link Building** — White-hat backlink acquisition through outreach and content marketing
33. **SEO Consulting** — Strategic SEO advisory for long-term organic growth
34. **Google Ads Management** — Search, Display, and Shopping campaign setup and optimization
35. **Analytics Setup** — Google Analytics 4, Search Console, and custom dashboard configuration
36. **Marketing Automation** — Email sequences, lead nurturing, and CRM integration
37. **Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)** — Optimizing for AI search (Google AI Overviews, ChatGPT, Perplexity)

### Design (7 services)
38. **UX/UI Design** — User-centered design with Figma prototyping and usability testing
39. **Digital Strategy** — Online presence strategy, competitor analysis, and growth planning
40. **Brand Identity** — Logo design, visual identity systems, and brand guidelines
41. **Design Systems** — Reusable component libraries with Storybook documentation
42. **Prototyping** — Interactive prototypes for stakeholder validation before development
43. **Mobile-First Design** — Responsive design optimized for mobile devices first
44. **Content Marketing** — Blog strategy, article writing, and thought leadership content

## Technology Stack (12 Technologies)

### Frontend
- **React 18** — Component library for building interactive UIs
- **Next.js 14** — Full-stack React framework with App Router, SSR, and SSG
- **TypeScript** — Strict type-safe JavaScript superset
- **Vite 5** — Lightning-fast build tool and dev server
- **Tailwind CSS v4** — Utility-first CSS framework with JIT compilation
- **Framer Motion 11** — Production-ready animation library for React

### Backend & Infrastructure
- **Supabase** — Open-source Firebase alternative (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage, Edge Functions)
- **Vercel** — Deployment platform optimized for Next.js and React
- **Shopify** — E-commerce platform for online stores
- **Headless WordPress** — WordPress as a headless CMS via REST/GraphQL API
- **PostgreSQL** — Advanced open-source relational database
- **Node.js** — JavaScript runtime for server-side applications

## Industries Served (8 Sectors)
1. **Construction & Building** — CAKIR Facades, Archi Construction references
2. **Energy & Sustainability** — Consulting Energy, ISO Home Energy references
3. **Accounting & Finance** — Adamsons Accountants reference
4. **Healthcare & Medical** — Medical practice websites
5. **Education & Training** — Educational institution platforms
6. **E-Commerce & Retail** — FilenesSports reference
7. **Professional Services** — Law firms, consultancies, agencies
8. **Tourism & Hospitality** — Hotels, restaurants, travel agencies

## Pricing (Updated March 2026)
| Package | Price | Pages | Features | Delivery |
|---------|-------|-------|----------|----------|
| Launch | EUR 497 | 1 page | Responsive, SEO basics, contact form | 3-5 days |
| Growth | EUR 997 | 5-7 pages | Blog, advanced SEO, analytics | 7-10 days |
| Scale | EUR 1,997 | Full site | Multilingual (EN/FR/NL/DE), video | 14-18 days |
| Commerce | EUR 2,997 | E-commerce | Payment, inventory, multilingual | 21-28 days |
| Care Plan | EUR 97/mo | — | Hosting, updates, support, reports | Ongoing |

- Largest Contentful Paint: < 2.0s

- Total Blocking Time: < 150ms
